infotexts.entitydescription.clonepod: Revives dead people in a new body. Requires power, has a 2 minute cooldown.
infotexts.entitydescription.strangereagent: It's a shining, bright yellow fluid in a small glass vial. \n‖color:gui.orange‖When drank:‖color:end‖ Inflicts a unique affliction, causing max cellular damage but healing all cloning-related afflictions (including cellular damage and itself) after 1 hour. Max cellular damage means uncloneability. ‖color:gui.orange‖When dropped on the floor:‖color:end‖ \nExplodes, cloning all nearby dead humanoid or husk in their own bodies. Also deals a lot of damage, as explosions do.
infotexts.entitydescription.speedcloner: A compact version of the clone pod that clones and prepares bodies a lot faster, at the cost of higher cellular damage. Still requires power.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.strangereagent: Strange reagent makes its way through the body. Clears all cloning afflictions when maxed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cloneweakness.self: Cellular damage caused by cloning. Causes a general deterioration of function.
Extensive cellular damage has rendered you practically uncloneable.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cloneweakness: The patient is suffering from major cell damage after cloning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cloneweakness.uncl: Subject is uncloneable due to extensive cellular damage. Attempts to clone will go badly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.alienhead.self: You have no memories of being in this body, and it's freaking you out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.alienhead: Neurological and psychological symptoms after being decapitated and cloned. Causes a reduction in skills and permanent psychosis.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.postmortembarotrau: You feel constantly dizzy and short of breath. It hurts to breathe.
The patient was cloned after being crushed by water pressure, causing severe damage to the respiratory system.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.splitconsciousness: It feels like there's someone else controlling your body along with you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.narcolepsy.self: You suffer from occasional but sudden bouts of uncontrollable sleep.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.narcolepsy: Uncontrollable bouts of sleep caused by cellular damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.opiateintolerance: The patient cannot tolerate opiates and will vomit if administered.
Repeated cloning has led up to rapid and lethal organ failure. Slowly resolves itself over time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cellularbreakdown: A lethal condition that causes rapid organ failure. Fatal without treatment, but may resolve itself given enough time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.medicineinsensitiv: Your body no longer responds properly to medical treatment due to cloning-related damage.
The patient is almost entirely insensitive to medicine.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hemophilia.self: You are extremely prone to heavy bleeding from the most minor of cuts.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hemophilia: The patient has a tendency to bleed heavily from wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.frailbody.self: You are very sensitive to poisons, debuffs and stuns.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.frailbody: The patient is vulnerable to the effects of poisons and other debuffs, including stuns.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.clonefatigue: Temporary weakness, nausea and sensitivity to damage after cloning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cloning: Subject will wake up when the cloning process is complete.
infotexts.ClonePodGUITip: Insert a dead person's ID card with them nearby to clone.
